title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-4.2 - Construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-4.2 - Construction

State Regulations

Terms not defined in this Subpart are defined in Subpart 52-1 of this Part. Cardiovascular tissue banks shall apply for licensure and otherwise comply with Subpart 52-2 of this Part, and shall meet all general technical standards for tissue banks specified in Subpart 52-3 of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
52-4.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
